<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105182</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105182</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202724</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Soil Sampling</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Boden-Musterstück</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Prélèvement de Sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Amostragem Do Solo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Campione Del Terreno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδαφολογική δειγματοληψία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Muestreo Del Suelo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will learn how to sample soil to be analyzed for nutrient and lime requirements for proper plant growth.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erlernen, wie man den auf prüft 
Nährstoff- und Kalkanforderungen für korrektes Betriebswachstum 
analysiert zu werden Boden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants apprendront comment échantillonner
le sol à analyser des conditions d'éléments nutritifs et de chaux 
pour la croissance de plantes appropriée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes aprenderão como provar o solo a ser
analisado para exigências do nutriente e do cal para o crescimento de
planta apropriado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi impareranno come provare il terreno da
analizzare per i requisiti della calce e degli elementi nutritivi di 
sviluppo di pianta adeguato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα μάθουν πώς να επιλέξουν το χώμα που 
αναλύεται για τις απαιτήσεις θρεπτικών ουσιών και ασβέστη για την
κατάλληλη αύξηση εγκαταστάσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes aprenderán cómo muestrear el 
suelo que se analizará para los requisitos del alimento y de la cal 
para el crecimiento vegetal apropiado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DOUGLAS BEST
FN:DOUGLAS BEST
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105182</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
